pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Simple Connection Between the 'FormShare App' and 'R' for Advanced Analytics // Provides analytics directly from 'R'. It requires: 'FormShare App': https://github.com/qlands/FormShare = 2.22.0 . Analytics plugin: https://github.com/qlands/formshare_analytics_plugin . Remote SQL plugin: https://github.com/qlands/formshare_sql_plugin .
